name: Solar Fusion
description:
Story -> Sun mistakenly comes between the rings around whic the planets rotate.

So he must avoid hitting planets and astroids. Sun can destroy astroids
by shooting fireball at them but cannot destroy planets. he must avoid them.

Controls -> W or UpArrow Key to Move Up
    S or DownArrow Key to Move Down
    Space to Shoot (Fireball)

Since, I'm a beginner and i started learning unity few days back only. this is the best i can create for now.
thank you Noa for organising the Game Jam which gives me boost to learn quickly and create SOMETHING to submit
my entry in this game jam. I'm learning alot from your videos as well as Brackeys and Sykoo's Videos.
